== Koratty (CT) (627937) ==

Koratty (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 10.13 sq. km. and harbouring 4544 households with total population of 17618 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 260 km. Male population is 8593 and female population is 9025. Scheduled Caste population is 1925 and Scheduled Tribes population is 39. Census Location Code of the town is 627937<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 40 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Koratty at a distance of 0 km.
